title: That sad sad moment :(
body:
When your main/favourite champ has the 2nd highest ban rate of all champs

only 5% of people play him but he is banned 55% of the time D: thats more than Zed O_O

please nerf Azir so i can play him again D:

replies.body:
noo, don't nerf him!! 

JUST STOP BANNING HIM lol
